website_summaries.verdict: This solid ring float with a spring canopy is a comfortable way to let your baby enjoy the water.
pros: Crotch strap allows adjustment for a better fit
Ring self inflates in less than a minute

customer_reviews.title: Get the cheaper inflatable!
customer_reviews.text: Cheaper inflatable one is better! The canapoy poles came all bent up and wouldn’t straighten out like the picture. I tried a lot! I Had to hold the twisted canopy to block the sun entire time. The actual floating device is smaller than inflatable so baby can reach over the edge and tip it. Save your money and get the inflatable one with the canopy. Self inflator definitely needs improvement!
customer_reviews.author: Ang

customer_reviews.title: As shown and fully functional, except few smudges on it.
customer_reviews.text: Right out of the box ready to use, after open the cap for 5 min and close. My 18 months kid enjoying so much, so far a week usage. Only down side I have seen it came with smudges, couldn't remove, in three locations! may be a lightly used one!? lost two start there, as you lost customer faith and not fully satisfied due to high priced item didn't expect stains on it. Didn't return it for replacement, as kid loved it and they took more than a week to deliver to me, which is surprisingly Prime eligible item.
customer_reviews.author: Pavan Kumar Kora

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t like it
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the product. The patent of the foam sounds really cool but after a few minutes in the water I felt that it's not really stable and my son does not float safely. The assembly of the shade is very annoying. It comes with two long tubes and after putting them in it does not remain as tense as the picture and does not make enough shade for the baby.
customer_reviews.author: Alona

customer_reviews.title: Great first floaty and
customer_reviews.text: My little boy approaching his 1st birthday, is fair complected and the sunshade & self-inflating was a major draw. I wish the sunshade would allow a little more tightening, but otherwise it was a great investment! He’s can even lean forward on the ring and it does not lift in the back. Also love that I can put this on the side of the pool and even if it is crawled or walked on, I don’t have to worry about it popping. Dries quickly too, considering how dense the foam is!
customer_reviews.author: Tualatin Oregon Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Worked well in the pool and looks pretty good also. Didnt use it often though as my child did not like to be in it. Nothing to do with the float, he just didnt want to be in it.
customer_reviews.author: 2parents7kids

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Ours came with a broken zipper but we still made it work (we didn’t open it til summer so we decided not to return it) but the rest of it works well and is easy to use even though it’s a little bit to transport.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Parker

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice product, except that the sun shade doesn’t cover ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice product, except that the sun shade doesn’t cover the whole thing so baby is exposed anyway and the butt strap doesn’t stay centered so it’s hard to get baby in sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Sabina

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 8months he loves it. I feel completely comfortable with him in it and he seems very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Brittny

customer_reviews.title: Simple to inflate/deflate.
customer_reviews.text: East to inflate and easy to store. Grat quality float. Wish the cover was a little bit longer in the front but it did the job and the baby seems to love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Did not "self inflate" and the sunshade is very poorly made
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Easy but not perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Its very easy to inflate! But the shade cover leans very far back, I ended up having to tie it in a knot instead of using the Velcro because my son was exposed to the sun. Overall good product for the money!
customer_reviews.author: Dolly

customer_reviews.title: Easy to usr
customer_reviews.text: Tea like but wish sun shade was larger to give more protection
customer_reviews.author: pam t

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: Was one of the best made flotation devices I found for my grand babies
customer_reviews.author: Joy Brown

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson. And he went to go use it this weekend for the first time and the canopy ripped when putting the rods in. Where the rod was inserted it just ripped wide open. And we can’t even return it.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and has sun protection for fun in the sun
customer_reviews.text: My niece loves it and her parents tell me it’s great, I love the sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Didi

customer_reviews.title: This product isn’t sufficiently buoyant.
customer_reviews.text: This is not necessarily safe even if you a right with your baby helping balance it & constantly trying to keep your baby from inhaling the water that seeps in over the inflatable ring. My 6 month old grandson choked on water several times.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra C. Speich

customer_reviews.title: Self inflatable floaty w canopy
customer_reviews.text: The canopy part does not sit up right!keeps Falling back
customer_reviews.author: Negar s.

customer_reviews.title: Fun time in the Pool
customer_reviews.text: Can’t wait for it to warm up! Bought this for our granddaughter! Can’t wait to Use!
customer_reviews.author: Cheri Mahan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use, although I didn’t use the canopy. Since it is foam base, I felt baby was more secure.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wish the canopy would hold up better. Other than that, it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: It does not fully inflate, the 7 month old leans forward and it feels tippy and the canopy doesn't stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: faulty shade cover
customer_reviews.text: The protective shade does not stay up and did not from the very beginning.
customer_reviews.author: JOHN KNIPP

customer_reviews.title: It keeps her upright and the foam does not get super hot like other inflatable tubes
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 1 year and big for her size. It keeps her upright and the foam does not get super hot like other inflatable tubes. However, the sun shade does not stay up well and my baby has very fair skin so this was a major downside for me. The strap for the adjustable seat is an awesome feature if your baby wears a swim diaper or some kind of padding otherwise, ouch, I would assume this would be uncomfortable for both boys and girls. I also like that this one self inflates so as you are putting the sunscreen on your little one the float is taking care of itself.
customer_reviews.author: Rowan

customer_reviews.title: Useful for small kids.
customer_reviews.text: We used this baby floaty for our 11 month old during a vacation. Pros: - It blows up easily with minimal effort. - Baby fits well in it. - It is a cute and fun looking floaty. The colors are vibrant. Cons: - The SPF cover is a nice idea, but it doesn’t cover baby’s face when she is leaning forwards on the floaty. - It is difficult to get the air out, if you want to make it flat again. Overall we like the floaty and will continue to use it in the pool.
customer_reviews.author: Go Blue 99

customer_reviews.title: Cute baby boat
customer_reviews.text: I like this cute baby boat. It is nice to have a place to put your baby while in the water. I like that it has the Zip-Off Retractable Canopy. I like anything that helps shield the sun. My baby likes it. Of course not all babies will be happy, but it works for mine. Also, it is easy to use. Of course, it is not a replacement for supervision, so you should always watch your child while they are in it.
customer_reviews.author: B. McCarthy

customer_reviews.title: Best baby pool accessory ever
customer_reviews.text: This thing is AWESOME and every parent always asks me where I found it. I love that you can plop your little one inside and she has a sun shade, a floaty ring, and something for mom or dad to hold onto all in one. We take this to the pool a lot and it also is great that you just open the valve and it fills with air. After a full summer of use and abuse, it works perfectly and does not show any signs of wear. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: redhed

customer_reviews.title: I'm deflated after getting this pool float
customer_reviews.text: The SwimSchool SSB12795 Self flating Fabric Baby Boat Canopy, UPF50, Adjustable Seat, Pool Float, 6 to 24 Months, Blue isn't a worthwhile purchase in my book. I can overlook or minimize quality on certain types of items, but not a product that I'm putting an infant in especially when a body of water is concerned. When we first used it the float was flimsy. Next thing we know we have a leak. Time to move on.
customer_reviews.author: Mick McKeown

customer_reviews.title: Very safe!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my son very safe and protected from the sun. He loves to float around with us so it’s nice that this covers all the major areas and I don’t have to spend hours to inflate like other models. A great compact item to bring to the pool or lake!
customer_reviews.author: Fighting Sioux

customer_reviews.title: Great for baby pool time
customer_reviews.text: If you plan on swimming this summer with your baby you need one of these! It was sturdy and kept baby upright with some shade. The foam floaty didn't get hot to the touch like a plastic inflatable tube.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Works really well!! Easy to inflate and baby loved floating around in the pool... we really liked that the shade really does cover from the sun sufficiently too! And, appears to have a nice build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: The SwimSchool is a great float. The self inflating feature is great (although it takes a bit to fully inflate) and it holds my 2 yo upright and safely in the pool. No complaints about the umbrella portion either.
customer_reviews.author: Method2Madness

customer_reviews.title: Decent floaty
customer_reviews.text: A bit quirky doesn’t really ‘blow up’ like a floaty, it’s more like a life jacket. It’s self expanding feature requires no pump. Works good in the pool, but we feel more comfortable handing on it while the little one splashes.
customer_reviews.author: Parker-Moore Family

customer_reviews.title: Excellent design
customer_reviews.text: A really nice way to let baby have fun in the pool safely. Tough rubber tube inflates on its own and easy to adjust to child’s size. Floats really well and due to excellent design it doesn’t topple. The overhead shade is nice, but a bit flimsy. It won’t hold up to windy days. However, fine on calm summer days and will help shade babies sensitive skin. Check weight guidelines before purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christine K. Cornett-McVay

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift!
customer_reviews.text: This baby boat pool float has been great for the summer! We gifted this to our baby niece and she absolutely loves it! Very durable and a breeze to blow up!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler K

customer_reviews.title: It's not safe.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this float for my 8 month old daughter who is advanced. She crawls, sits and stands on her own. This device did inflate easily. But it is NOT sturdy at all. My daughter grabbed the main ring and pulled it to herself almost flipping the whole float. This float is not safe and I do not recommend it. I was terrified and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great swim float for my little one. She fits easily in it, it's not that annoying plastic that is hard on the skin. The pattern is cute and the cover is great for shade. Overall, it makes for a great swim!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

product_meta.title: SwimSchool Self-Inflating High-Tech Safety Foam, Fabric Baby Boat Pool Float, Splash & Play Activity Center, Retractable/Removable Canopy, UPF 50, Adjustable Safety Seat, 6 to 24 Months, Blue
product_meta.description:
Style: Self-Inflating, Unsinkable, Baby Boat, Zip-Off Canopy 

The Ultimate, Self-Inflating Baby Boat - only from SwimSchool. No pumps, no fuss! Introduce your baby to the water with the convenience and safety of super “unsinkable” dense foam. With a quick twist of the valve, watch as the fabric float inflates before your eyes in less than a minute. Ultimate comfort for baby with the boat’s soft fabric and foam cushion core. Baby will sit comfortably in the water with the Perfect Fit adjustable seat. The BabyBoat also features a UPF50 canopy to shade your little one from the sun’s harmful rays; the canopy is removable too. When splash time is over, open the valve, roll up, and go. The Self-Inflating BabyBoat is a key part of the SwimSchool Training System by Aqua-Leisure. 

• The Ultimate, Self-Inflating, Extra-Wide Fabric Baby Boat with Zip-Off UPF50+ SunShade Canopy 

• Light Blue, Multi-Colored Sea Creatures designed pool float with “Perfect Fit” Adjustable Seat. 

• Super “unsinkable” dense foam core with quick inflate or deflate twist valve. 

• Easily Inflatable and Portable: Inflate and deflate easily. Folds for portability and storage. 

• Dimensions 25” (63.5 cm) in diameter for added stability. 

• Recommended ages 6-24 months. 

SAFETY WARNING: 

This is not a life-saving device. NEVER leave children unattended while device is in use. Only to be used in water in which the child is within its depth and under adult supervision. Do not overinflate or use high pressure air to inflate. Under no circumstances, should a child left in and around water unless a competent adult swimmer is present supervising the child. Do not use with a baby who cannot sit confidently. The possibility does exist that a baby could tip over. To reduce the risk of this happening, the water must be dep enough so that the baby cannot touch bottom. Always exercise extra caution when babies are teething as they could puncture the baby boat. Do not give any playing accessories that have the potential to puncture or damage this product. 

CARE AND MAINTENANCE: 

-Rinse with clean water after use and dry completely. 

-Do not allow products to be exposed to direct sunlight for long periods of time. 

-Store in a cool, dry place. 

 COMMITTED TO CUSTOMER SATISFACTION:

 LIMITED WARRANTY – Your satisfaction is our ultimate goal. That’s why all Aqua-Leisure products carry our performance warranty. Fabric colors may fade if frequently used in high chlorine-salt-bromine chemically treated pool water or ocean-water. More importantly, commercial pools are much higher in chlorine, salt and bromine levels than your average home residential pool. Product color and graphics may vary from those pictured. For warranty service or more information, email Aqua-Leisure Industries, Inc. at customercare@aqualeisure.com.
feature_bullets: SELF-INFLATING BABY BOAT POOL FLOAT: Inflates in 60 Seconds, NO Pumps, NO Mouth, NO Fuss; Multi-Colored Sea Creatures Design
SAFE SPLASH & PLAY CENTER: Safe, Secure, Adjustable Seat keeps baby upright to easily reach and play with toys in open-mesh play area
100% SAFETY SUPER DENSE FOAM CORE: Most buoyant baby boat for maximum safety; 100% Satisfaction
PATENTED PERFECT FIT Adjustable Safety Seat to lift your baby to a comfortable level in the water; The Ultimate Baby Float.
UPF 50 SUNSHADE CANOPY: Retractable (120 degrees) Fabric Canopy protects baby from the sun's harmful rays; Quickly Removable, too!
EASY TO INFLATE & DEFLATE: Pack-and-go portability and storage. Great pool float for travel!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars96 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
